content:
Epigenetic alterations affecting DSB repair gene expression increase neoplasia susceptibility, and epigenetic therapy can restore repair capacity and suppress tumorigenesis in pre-malignant cells.  
*Supporting evidence:* Epigenetic silencing of repair genes is observed in cancers [Esteller 2008]. DNA methyltransferase inhibitors can restore expression of silenced repair genes [Teodoridis 2004, Cancer Res].

---
